Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{3: 'Nanami has never seen a battlefield like this.'}
{3: 'The ground is charred black under the moonlight. The smell of sulfur spreads in the air as fires slowly burn in the ruins.'}
{3: 'Dead bodies of humans, Constructs, and mechanoids remain tangled in a fight. Broken mechanoids speak with their stammering voices, "Free will for machines."'}
{3: 'But no one here is alive. There is no sign of life.'}
{3: 'This is obviously not one of the possible futures Nanami has imagined.'}
{3: 'She walks speedily among the ruins, scanning every possibly useful data. Searching for a weak signal she detected, she begins to get the lay of the land.'}
{3: 'All structures in this area look twisted. They are built with large, uniform pyramids, and they all look odd and cold without a hint of humanity.'}
{3: 'As she analyzes, she finds the frontline on this battlefield retreating. Scales of engagements also seem to be reducing.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Message deciphered... Fort Niflheim?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unknown Construct', 3: 'Warning: unknown mechanoid detected. Attack!'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{3: 'As Nanami finishes deciphering the message and discovers information on humans, bullets that come out of nowhere hit her in the chest.'}
{3: 'Nanami looks up to see fully armed Constructs lying on a roof high above. Hearing their shouts, Nanami does not have time to rejoice before she is shot down from Power.'}

{3: "Looking at the scratches on her chest, Nanami feels a twisted pain in her head. Humans' bullets have never caused her any real harm, but the realistic impacts and the dissonant scene are giving her a headache."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Any damage you receive in the future will also impact your program logic.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{3: 'More bullets shower down. Nanami has to retreat from the assault, blocking the shots with her arm.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Why are you... doing this...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No one answers her. Her voice is drowned in the sound of gunfire.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Unknown Construct', 3: 'Quickly! The hostile mechanoid has left her vehicle, showing no sign to attack. Concentrate fire and take her down!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Everyone is... avoiding... Nanami... Why...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Arghâ€”my head hurts...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Everyone is... leaving me...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Memories and reality interweave in her head, washing over her.'}
{3: 'The ground below her begins to shake and crumple, revealing a pit designed to trap large mechanoids. Power accidentally takes a wrong step and tips, now stuck.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No... This time, Nanami will be different...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Clenching her teeth, Nanami walks forward on the collapsed ground, struggling to inform the other party she is a friend.'}
{3: 'Unexpectedly, a hand drags her away.'}

{3: "That person seems to have descended from heaven, breezing through the difficult terrain and dodging the gunshots, bringing Nanami behind her slanted mech. A missile brushes past the mech's armor, exploding mid-air."}
{3: "Speaking with a calm voice, that person opens his or her cloak to block the blinding searchlight from the fort, the person's face hidden in the hood."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Who are you?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "I'll explain later. In 10 seconds, the humans will empty their weapons and reload, which takes about 30 seconds. Please take this opportunity to escape.", 4: '2'}
{3: "The mechanoid repeats her suggestion, carrying Nanami to Power's cockpit before jumping down the trap and lifting Power's leg, letting it regain balance."}
{2: '???', 3: '8 seconds. This mech should be fast enough. Please make use of it.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Huh...? H-hold on! Nanami is not leaving! Nanami is asking them why they're hurting Nanami! I won't be shot at for no reason! Maybe they thought Power was going to attack them...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "5 seconds. They're not afraid because of the weapon you're piloting. They're afraid because we are machines.", 4: '2'}

{3: 'The suppressive fire starts to diminish as Constructs in charge of close-range battles depart the fort, blades in hand. Facing an "enemy" unscathed by bullets, the soldiers are ardent to kill her in one last stand.'}
{2: '???', 3: "If you don't leave now, you will only cause more deaths.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Decisively, Nanami pilots Power and exits the pit.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Lead the way!', 4: '1'}
